Posts.Content: Just my two cents , we are vegans and we very rarely eat soy, maybe you should look into it. We also only use organic body products .
Posts.Title: Are you Estrogen positive Breast cancer and think you know what caused it?

Posts.Content: Wow, to say that you have a lot on your plate is an understatement ! Would it be possible for your mom to move closer to you ?  I know that is easier said than done . Does she have any family or friends that live close to her that could help out ?
Posts.Title: Coping with my moms chemo for breast cancer

Posts.Content: Hey, welcome to CC . Sorry your family is going through this nightmare. A good thing to do is just take things as they come. Having cancer in your life is like being on a rollercoaster . One day things are ok and the next day things are not . You will find the strength , tho it may not seem like it now . You will learn to live to  the "new normal " .  I can remember how afraid I was when my mom was dx with cancer , I am also amazed at the things that I did to help her through the journey , you will be challenged every day . One day at a time , one foot in front of the other.  Namaste DharmaGirl
Posts.Title: Coping with my moms chemo for breast cancer

Posts.Content: On May 30, 2014 1:16 PM Momismyhero wrote: Thank you to all of the great advise you have all given me. I've found a couple of good apps to put on my ipad to re rood all the information on meds as well as a diary for the aches and pains. This is the first group I've joined and I value you all the information. When I choose the app pot if anyone else has an app they use let me know. Thanks again to everyone. You might want to post on the caregiver boards as well . lots of people there going through the same thing you are . Please stay in touch .
Posts.Title: Coping with my moms chemo for breast cancer

Posts.Content: Sue , we also did Lovenox shots . I pinch the skin on my mom's stomach , put the needle in and pushed the plugger . Way less pain. This was something we found on the internet as well , the nurses never gave any instruction . I hate needles so I can't belive I did this twice a day .
